scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.db:clean: docker exec buchungsai-postgres psql -U buchungsai -d buchungsai -c "DELETE FROM matchings; DELETE FROM validation_results; DELETE FROM extracted_data; DELETE FROM audit_logs; DELETE FROM invoices; DELETE FROM vendors; DELETE FROM bank_statements; DELETE FROM bank_transactions; SELECT 'Alles gelöscht — bereit für frische Tests.' AS status;"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint -w server" "npm run lint -w client"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test -w server" "npm run test -w client"
